ygData.subject: Diablo
ygData.msgSnippet: (OOC: Airshadow, yes I did mean Diablo.. LOL I got a bit mixed up with spelling) Diablo watched the battle for a few more minutes, and then snickered quietly

(OOC: Airshadow, yes I did mean Diablo.. LOL I got a bit mixed up 
with spelling)

Diablo watched the battle for a few more minutes, and then snickered 
quietly as he saw a bot (Angel Prime) kiss a female that was 
obviously in trouble (Teltoli). At first he thought that there was 
something going on, but his sharp eyes picked out the fact that the 
female's wounds had vanished.

His main eyes narrowed, while his stalk eyes continued to scan the 
field. If he was to join the attackers, he'd have to start by getting 
rid of this bot that healed others. Not really needing to revert to 
Bot mode, Diablo took a step forward, still hidden by the stealthing 
technology. With careful aim he flung out his long tail in a whipping 
motion, and the poisoned scythe blade on the end spun towards Angel 
Prime.

He knew it would hit, as it too was cloaked, and it even poisoned the 
air around it, so any way he would still get infected. It was 
something of a virus, you never knew it was there until it actually 
knocked you senseless.

Another scythe began to grow back on his tail, as he watched his 
scythe fly into the battlefield.


===============

Profile...

Name: Diablo

Gender: Male

Beast Mode Characteristics: His body is like one of a cenataur, yet 
slightly different. He had horse legs and body, but where the horse 
chest would be is a slightly human torso, with strong looking arms 
and chest. His face has no mouth, just a nose, pointed ears, and two 
black almond eyes. Atop his head sit two stalk eyes which could twist 
in any direction. His whole body is covered in black fur. Where the 
horse tail would be, is a 2 meters long tail, with a scythe like 
blade, wickedly sharp and coated with poison, on the end. He can 
fling these at enemies, and another one will grow instantly, and he 
can also use it like a blade. 

Robot Mode Characteristics: In Bot Mode, Diabo is a mix of Dark Blue 
and Midnight Black. He legs are strong, and sturdy, supporting a 
spike at the knee which can be driven into opponents. His chest is 
plain, rippled with muscles, leading to his arms which at the elbows 
have another two spikes. His face pretty much remains the same, 
except for the fact the fur gives way to dark blue metal and the 
stalk eyes vanish.

Personality: Diabo is, what you could say, Tainted with Evil. He's 
never done one good deed in his life, and never intends to. He uses 
poison alot, and heavy firepower. He never shows any emotion, and it 
is said that he can outwait a stone.

Weapons: His blade turns into a scythe weapon, still with poison. 
Black Optic lasers than if hit, knock the bot out for three hours.
